Consultation.title: Consultation Template
Consultation.description: Fill out this template during a consultation. Leave any unanswered fields blank and click 'Copy All to Clipboard' to paste into Salesforce.
questions: What State(s) does the business operate in?
Do they have employees that live/work in other states?
Any notable payroll circumstances this year? (EIN change, 1099s to W2)
# of employees paid this year (include both active/inactive):
Do you offer Vacation/Sick/PTO? If so, how are the hours accrued?
Do you offer Healthcare/Retirement? Is the healthcare pre/post tax deduction?
Do you have a company match for healthcare/retirement?
Do you have other deductions/wage garnishments we need to be aware of?
Do you pay via DD or checks?
What is the highest DD net payroll for the company?
What is the highest DD net paid employee per check run?
Are there any special tax exemptions for the company or for the employees, or do you pay all applicable payroll taxes?
Have you made any FUTA payments this year:
If not, due date for file to meet EFP: (date)

General.title: General Call Notes Template
General.description: Use the template below in the notes section in IEP immediately following any general call. This will help anybody who comes in behind you, and yourself, see how many contacts (attempts and connections) were made and what type of contact it was. Two way chat communications without an associated phone call do not require an additional note.

NotReadyUnqualifiedIncomplete.title: Not Ready/ Unqualified/ Incomplete Notes Template
NotReadyUnqualifiedIncomplete.description: Utilize this template when customers are unable to meet the following: Customer no start due to PEO, customer needs to start in the new Fiscal Year; Risk/ Compliance related issues; Unable to meet first payroll run; Duplicate engagement; Customer is associated with an ongoing product investigation.

RunPayroll.title: Run Payroll Call Notes Template
RunPayroll.description: Use the template below in the notes section in IEP immediately following first payroll calls.
questions: Has the customer signed authorization form? (y/n)
Milestone updated in the Run Payroll In IEP? (y/n)
Verify pay period and check date correct (y/n)
Payroll Processed via DD or Checks:
Informed Customer to cancel old service?
Delete any customer files/reports/etc. saved to your computer ?

BuildSubmission.title: Build Submission Template
BuildSubmission.description: Use this template for build submissions.
questions: Build Type (EE’s only, History Only or Full Build):
FTU Complete: (if no, what steps are needed)
What is the 1st PR/ Apt RFP date:
# of Active EE’s to be added:
Does builder need to delete inactive EE’s:
Special tax exemptions for employees or company(FUTA/SUI etc):
Current quarter check dates listed individually:
What date have taxes been paid through:
Who is handling outstanding tax payments?
Past due taxes to discuss w/ customer (if applicable):

BuildUpdate.title: Build Update Template
BuildUpdate.description: Builders and FOE's use the template below in IEP to communicate throughout the build process. Adding the @username will alert receiving expert of questions or updates to the build.

EndOfDayBuild.title: End of Day Build Notes Template
EndOfDayBuild.description: Use this template at the end of your build session. Leave any unanswered fields blank.
questions: EEs Entered (including any applicable local taxes):
Tax Payments Entered for historical payrolls (closed/current quarters):

BuildComplete.title: Build Complete Notes Template
BuildComplete.description: Use this template after completing an account build. Leave any unanswered fields blank.
questions: Under/overpaid taxes as a result of incorrect history:
Tax Payments Recorded for historical payroll:
